column10: * assetto corsa uses (0,0,0) as center of wheel, vs this system which uses vehicle center (wheelbase/2)
X+ -> towards car center, X- -> away from car center
Z+ -> in front of wheel center
Thus, need to swap X and Y axis when converting this system to assetto corsa
Also, wheel center appears to be the center of the tire
Z here is Y in AC
X here is Z in AC
column12: plus is up, minus is down

column10: Y here is X in AC
column12: Here, positive y is negative x (around center of wheel), negative y is positive x

column11: 1. Read in data from here, preferrably the LEFT data
3. Solve for center of wheel (halftrack width, rim diameter, tire width) + (wheel base)
4. Perform change of reference point calculations
5. Swap axis according to conversion above (Z->Y, X->Z, Y->-X)
